tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legislative_documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_title STRING,
    document_type STRING,
    document_content TEXT,
    publish_date TIMESTAMP,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE document_relationships (
 relationship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 document_id INT NOT NULL,
 category_id INT NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES legislative_documents(document_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES document_categories(category_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Documents (document_id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255), content TEXT, author VARCHAR(100), date_published DATE);
CREATE TABLE Categories (category_id INT PRIMARY KEY, category_name VARCHAR(50), description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Tags (tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY, tag_name VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE DocumentCategories (document_id INT REFERENCES Documents(document_id), category_id INT REFERENCES Categories(category_id), PRIMARY KEY (document_id, category_id));
CREATE TABLE DocumentTags (document_id INT REFERENCES Documents(document_id), tag_id INT REFERENCES Tags(tag_id), PRIMARY KEY (document_id, tag_id));
